page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I GET UP AT 7.OO A.M, GO DOWNSTAIRS AND FEED MY KITTEN FLUFFY. SHE EATS TINNED CAT FOOD AND DRINKS MILK. THEN I LET HER OUT TO PLAY. I HAVE MY BREAKFAST, GET WASHED, CLEAN MY TEETH AND BRUSH MY HAIR. AT 8.4O A.M. I GO TO{SCHOOL}.IT IS MONDAY. AFTER A SHORT TIME IN THE PLAYGROUND SCHOOL BEGINS. AFTER{REGISTRATION}, THE FIRST LESSON IS SCIENCE AND WE DO GROUP PRACTICAL AND WRITTEN WORK FOR A SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY COMPETITION. AFTER LUNCH IS DINNER BREAK. FIRST IN THE AFTERNOON IS MATHS. WE ARE DOING ADDITION AND SUBTRACTION OF FRACTIONS. LAST WE HAVE {GAMES}.THE BOYS PLAY FOOTBALL AND THE GIRLS PLAY NETBALL. THEN WE GO HOME. AFTER TEA I GET CHANGED AND PLAY WITH FRIENDS UNTIL 7.30 A.M. I WATCH{ {TELEVISION}AND GO TO BED ABOUT 9.00 P.M.
